name: Kaiju Speed DAIting
description:
This tiny game was made during a Game Jam and tries to combine the Keywords 'Kaiju' and 'AI'. All the dialogue was AI generated.

Description

The Kaijus are back, but this time they just want to…mingle?

Control our most powerful Robot and try to calm them down by inviting them on a date!

Listen carefully to what they are saying and try to respond in a way they would like. 

If you choose the right Flirt-style, you gain points. If you choose a wrong style, you will lose points.

Scoring at least 80 (?) Points at the end of a date will make you victorious and the Kaiju will leave happily.

Credits
  • Programming by Zheist
  • Programming&Animations by Frodo
  • Art by Ditzie Doodle
  • Music by Context Sensitive
  • SFX from freesound.org
